response.overview: Ibu Aisyah is a heartwarming story about two mothers --- Khadijah, a dedicated foster mother, and Mariah, a reformed ex-convict and biological mother to 7-year-old Aisyah --- who find their worlds colliding when Mariah is released from prison. Struggling with their differences, Khadijah, protective of the child she has raised since infancy, clashes with Mariah. Amidst the turmoil, Khadijah discovers the true circumstances behind Mariah's incarceration, realizing her sincere efforts to change for Aisyah's sake. Torn between loyalty to Aisyah and newfound empathy for Mariah, Khadijah decides to bridge the gap. Aisyah, resistant and unwilling to accept Mariah, becomes the focal point of their journey. Khadijah, determined to unite the fractured family, embarks on a mission to help Aisyah see the transformative love within Mariah. Through challenges and heartwarming moments, the trio discovers that family is not only about biology but also the bonds forged through understanding,
response.title: Ibu Aisyah
